resources.string: In this screen the user will be able to search for artist, albums, or songs.
The Discover button will bring the user to new a activity with a list of different genres.
The Podcast button will bring the user to new activity in which the user can find new podcasts as well as a list of podcasts thatthe user is following.
Once the Store button is clicked it will launch the user to a new activity in which the user can purchase music.
The Now Playing function will bring up a MediaPlayer that will allow the user to play, pause, skip, stop, and seek.
